text:
<@U2PDTMH53>  that is working as expected. The module doesn't have those fields and cannot pass the fields to the forms anyways. A work around if you do need it to work in the page editor is to make the forms at the page level and have the choice field conditionally show the forms.

Also just an FYI forms can be edited under the contacts menu in a forms manager screen. I realize it's not the same as editing on the live page but does get the job done

At the page level, when content creators choose the form they should be able to have access to all the form settings regardless how the form was added to the page. That’s all i’m saying :slightly_smiling_face:
